mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cloud (dept_idx, filename, user_id, created_at) VALUES (#{dept_idx}, #{filename}, #{userId}, #{created_at})
mapper.select: SELECT c.file_idx, c.dept_idx, c.filename, c.created_at, d.dept_name, c.user_id, m.name as uploader_name, m.lv_idx, l.lv_name FROM cloud c LEFT JOIN department d ON c.dept_idx = d.dept_idx LEFT JOIN member m ON c.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN level l ON m.lv_idx = l.lv_idx WHERE c.dept_idx = #{dept_idx} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.file_idx, c.dept_idx, c.filename, c.created_at, d.dept_name, c.user_id, m.name as uploader_name, m.lv_idx, l.lv_name FROM cloud c LEFT JOIN department d ON c.dept_idx = d.dept_idx LEFT JOIN member m ON c.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN level l ON m.lv_idx = l.lv_idx WHERE c.file_idx = #{fileIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO download_log (file_idx, user_id, down_time) VALUES (#{file_idx}, #{user_id}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT dept_idx, dept_name FROM department ORDER BY dept_idx ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO link (user_id, link_name, url) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{link_name}, #{url})
mapper.select: SELECT l.link_idx, l.user_id, l.link_name, l.url, m.name as uploader_name, m.lv_idx, m.dept_idx, lev.lv_name FROM link l LEFT JOIN member m ON l.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN level lev ON m.lv_idx = lev.lv_idx ORDER BY l.link_idx DESC

SELECT l.link_idx, l.user_id, l.link_name, l.url, m.name as uploader_name, m.lv_idx, m.dept_idx, lev.lv_name FROM link l LEFT JOIN member m ON l.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN level lev ON m.lv_idx = lev.lv_idx WHERE l.link_idx = #{linkIdx}
